name: Wild Card
effect: Counts as all suits at once.

name: Glass Card
effect: Gives x2 mult when scored. 1 in 4 chance to destroy card after scoring.

name: Steel Card
effect: Gives x1.5 mult while held in hand.

name: Gold Card
effect: Gives $3 if held in hand at end of round.

name: Lucky Card
effect: 1 in 5 chance to give +20 mult, 1 in 15 chance to give $20. Both can trigger.

name: Red Seal
effect: Retrigger this card 1 time. Applies to scoring and in-hand effects.

name: Blue Seal
effect: Creates a Planet card for final played poker hand of round if held in hand.

name: Purple Seal
effect: Creates a Tarot card when discarded (by player or The Hook).
